default.$description: This is the color to replace in white label products. Ensure luminousity of custom color = 46.8 (see hsluv.org).  AAA against FFFFFF bg.

defaultAlt.$description: This is the color to replace in white label products. Dark mode recommended luminosity for SAGE is 75.1 (tested), but above 51.9 should be ok. See hsluv.org to be AAA text on 000000 bgs.

frozen.$description: This is a derivative of Jade, and is the color to replace in white label products that use the FROZEN theme. Ensure luminousity of custom color = 46.8 (see hsluv.org). AAA against FFFFFF bg.

moderate.$description: was 0.5. Increased to 0.55 so that we can use this for hint text etc too, and still be accessible.

faint.$description: used on full page backgrounds as an alternative option

hover.$description: used on solid-pill and primary-button hover states

hoverAlt.$description: used on secondary-button hover states

withActive.$description: checkbox tick icon or radio handle

withHover.$description: text for draggable area on file input

hoverAlt.$description: bg hover for draggable area on file input

contentAlt.$description: Hint text, placeholder text, character count etc

default.$description: Disabled form secondary, tertiary and input borders borders.

mask.$description: full screen takeover token for modal dimmer

defaultAlt.$description: Disabled input and button backgrounds, button borders and input backgrounds.

content.$description: Disabled text inside buttons and form inputs.

contentAlt.$description: Disabled labels inside buttons and Switch.

icon.$description: Disabled icon inside buttons and form inputs.

defaultAlt.$description: Disabled input and button backgrounds, button borders and input backgrounds.

default.$description: Inversed disabled form secondary, tertiary and input borders borders.

content.$description: Inversed disabled text inside buttons and form inputs.

hoverAlt.$description: Accordion, secondary, tertiary, menu bg on hover

hoverAlt.$description: Accordion, secondary, tertiary, menu bg on hover

defaultAlt.$description: default bg for left nav container
